alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 10:32PM PDT until November 05 at 7:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. In Washington, Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
